A less-than-half-finished crossword? Jerk puzzle (8)

The Cryptic Crossword: Sunday, October 2, 2022

Type of Clue   Charades
Cryptic / Straight   A less-than-half-finished crossword? Jerk puzzle
Solution and Explanation

  ACROSTIC


  • A → A
  • less-than-half-finished crossword? → CROS (half of the word crossword)
  • JERK → TIC (synonym)
  • puzzle → ACROSTIC
